summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 29, 2019. It details inmate statuses, staff assignments, and operational statistics. Most significantly, it records inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) as being on 'Psych Obs.' (psychiatric observation) with an inmate companion, just over two weeks before his death.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was on psychiatric observation ('Psych Obs.') as of July 29, 2019.
Epstein was listed with an 'inmate companion' while on psychiatric observation.
The report documents staff shortages affecting correctional assignments, specifically for '10-South #2'.
The total inmate population at MCC New York at the beginning of the morning watch shift on July 29, 2019, was 766.
This administrative report was created the day after the recorded activities, on July 30, 2019.
